synonyms: prābhava-vilāsa—the prābhava-vilāsa forms; vāsudeva—Vāsudeva; saṅkarṣaṇa—Saṅkarṣaṇa; pradyumna—Pradyumna; aniruddha—Aniruddha; mukhya cāri-jana—the four chief expansions.
translation: "The chief quadruple expansions are named Vāsudeva, Saṅkarṣaṇa, Pradyumna and Aniruddha. These are called prābhava-vilāsa.
